data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Nord-Ouest to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nord-Ouest, Cameroon
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Nord-Ouest, Cameroon to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 159,032 believers in the state of Nord-Ouest the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Nord-Ouest. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, help the 159,032 believers in Nord-Ouest to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Nord-Ouest, Cameroon to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nord-Ouest, Cameroon has a population of 1,729,000.

We estimate Nord-Ouest has 159,032 people who might know Jesus, 746,608 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 823,360 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Nord-Ouest words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

location.name: Nord-Ouest
